DataElement.preferredName: Quality of Life Consent Withdrawn Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An explanation why the patient withdrew consent for participation in the Quality of Life portion of the study not previously listed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Quality of Life Consent Withdrawn
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._When the permission to do something is rescinded or withdrawn.
